alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:01PM PST until December 25 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow and freezing rain Sunday night, then freezing rain on Monday. Total snow accumulations of less than an inch, with ice accumulations of a tenth to third an inch. Some spots may see up to a half inch of ice, mainly in south and west side of the upper Hood River Valley, including Parkdale and Dee. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
